questions.question: にほんごのクラス（＿）まいにち　べんきょうします。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～でべんきょうする - to study at (location)

クラス - class

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「クラスでべんきょうします」 means "I study in the class."
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is で.

  • に - destination or time
  • を - object marker
  • は - topic marker

questions.question: あした　ともだち（＿）えいがを見ます。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～と - with (person)

えいがを見ます - to watch a movie

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「ともだちとえいがを見ます」 means "I will watch a movie with a friend."
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is と.

  • で - place
  • を - object marker
  • に - direction

questions.question: このシャツ（＿）500えんでした。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～は～でした - topic + past state

500えん - 500 yen

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「このシャツは500えんでした」 means "This shirt was 500 yen."
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is は.

  • で - method/means
  • を - object
  • が - subject (possible, but less common in price statements)

questions.question: にほん（＿）たべものが　すきです。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

AのB - B belonging to A (noun modifier)

すき - like

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「にほんのたべものがすきです」 means "I like Japanese food."
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is の.

  • を - object
  • に - direction/time
  • が - subject, not used here for modifying
